name: This Panda Needs You
description:
Help panda re-stack her building blocks blown over by the wind with your block stacking and problem solving!

GAME PLAY FEATURES
+ Over 50 levels of varying difficulty
+ Blocks stack and topple with realistic physics
+ 7 shapes and 6 colors keeps the game and patterns interesting
+ Ability to skip ahead or jump to a random level
+ Stacking building blocks is fun!

LEARNING FEATURES
+ Self-paced game play, low pressure, high enjoyment for young children
+ Find your own way to make space, sort and stack the blocks
+ Panda animation and musical cues provide feedback on progress
+ Game play promotes pattern recognition, shape and color matching and problem solving

PLATFORMS

MacOS: 64bit 10.9 and above. Tested on 10.12.

Windows: 64bit Windows 7 and above. Tested on Windows 10.
